episodes.title: E93 Exposing Opus Dei's Web of Influence, Corruption and Trafficking
episodes.description: Derrick Broze talks with Gareth Gore, author of Opus: The Cult of Dark Money, Human Trafficking, and Right-Wing Conspiracy inside the Catholic Church. Mr. Gore breaks down the history of abuse within the little known Catholic organization, Opus Dei. He explains the role Opus Dei plays on American politics, and the connections between the group and US Vice President JD Vance and Peter Thiel. Don't miss this informative interview! Show Notes: https://theconsciousresistance.com/exposing-opus-dei The Conscious Resistance Network is an independent media organization focused on empowering individuals through education, philosophy, health, and community organizing. We work to create a world where corporate and state power does not rule over the lives of free human beings.
